column1: Local Foods////This place is more than a sandwich shop. They are the special treat I reward myself with at the end of a long week. Local Foods is the place I bring healthy food skeptics to prove them wrong. I was once one of those skeptics. Local Foods has heart. It's a place built on values. All the ingredients are fresh
column2: treated with love and patience. The manager cares sincerely for the place like it's his baby. Even if you don't love it
column3: you have to respect a place that is trying to make delicious
column5: how could you not LOVE Local Foods?
